slides.title: Project handling
slides.description: Quick tour to and around project handling in WebIDE

slides.title: Select Directory on Local Drive
slides.description:
...click on the Select Directory for Sandbox button.
In the next step you'll need to choose a directory that Espruino can use to store your files.

slides.title: Assign directory
slides.description: You've now selected a project directory.

slides.title: Open Projects window
slides.description: Open the project window,  with tabs for local projects, modules and binaries.

slides.title: Projects window
slides.description:
To open a project simply click name of project file.
Binaries (compiled assembler code and modules) are listed only.

slides.title: Projects done
slides.description: ...Now that you got a quick overview, check out the functions by yourself and enjoy.
